name: workflow_search_for_nearby_location_type
description: Search for a specific **type** of place on OpenStreetMap near a specific location (e.g. restaurants near Carnegie Mellon University). In case no results are found, try making the search more general or use expansions instead of abbreviations.

steps.description: Navigate to OpenStreetMap search with query and map centered at the first result (if found).

input_schema.name: base_url
input_schema.description: Base URL of the OpenStreetMap instance (e.g., http://3.12.136.212:3000)

input_schema.name: location_type
input_schema.description: Type of place to search for (e.g. restaurant or airport).

input_schema.name: location
input_schema.description: Location to search near - ideally should be a specific place name (e.g. Carnegie Mellon University)
